DOC.brief_summary: A Multicenter, Double-blind 16 Week Study on the augmentation of atypical antipsychotic with Aripiprazole in patients with Schizophrenia with inadequate response to antipsychotic treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Aripiprazole Used as Dual Therapy in the Treatement of Patients With Chronic Stable Schizophrenia or Schizoaffective Disorder.
DOC.criteria: Patient with diagnosis of chronic Schizophrenia or Schizoaffective disorder Stable symptoms and dose of Quetiapine or Risperidone First diagnosis in the past year Significant risk of suicide or meet DSMIVTR criteria for substance abuse
